Reviews.Title: Absolutely Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Kirk D. Skorzak
Reviews.Content: I think it took me longer to unpack it and attach the stand than it did to hook it up and have it running. I connected it to my DirecTV HD box via HDMI and it delivers a clear, bright and brillint picture - note, the DirectTV has the Vizio codes needed to program their remote to this TV so you may use that for on, off, volume, channels. The viewing angles are very broad, I have it in the kitchen and as much as I move around I have not yet been in a position where the picture fades. The stand is not adjustable but sitting on top of the HD box the picure is not distorted or fading whether I am standing to prep and cook a meal or sitting down to eat.I have no problem with the sound, it is clear and full without using any external speakers, sound bar, etc. I have not had the fainest problem with the sound being tinny as you may expect or experience with this smaller class of TV's. Although I did not need or use them, there are several adjustments available via the on-screen menu display for different sound options including Tru-Sound, SRS Surround Sound or customizing to your own choosing.The only issue that one may have could be a lag in the TV turning on/off, there seems to be a slight few second delay. I really don't feel that to be an issue so much with this TV as it could be with the connections between the TV and the DirecTV functions. I had the same delay in on/off with the old Sylvania CRT TV this replaced, and still experience it with the Magnavox CRT TV I have in the bedroom connected to a DirecTV box as well as the 32" Vizio HDTV I have in the Living Room with an HDMI connection to the DirecTV.Overall, I feel this is a great quality TV, and you simply can't find a better price than right here at Amazon.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Patrick A. Farias "patrickfromhi"
Reviews.Content: love it...it has great color and  sound...19inches is just right for my apartment...the only negative thing is that the usb port wont run video from flasher like it advertised in product description...but i can going on living without it...its always great to deal with amazon..before i bought this tv i tried to buy a 19 inch rca tv...it was a real bummer but i was able to return it to amazon before my 30 days trial period ran out..recommend this vizio 19 inch to everyone...aloha from hawaiipatricka long time friend of amazon

Reviews.Title: A well received gift!
Reviews.Author: R. Floyd "rfloyd"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for an elderly friend (88 AND 1/2), to replace an old television she used in her kitchen, and she just loves it!  She's amazed at how thin it is, how sharp the picture is, and how good the signal reception is. She doesn't do cable, so the reception part is particularly important.  A bonus is how much it freed up counter space for her in her small kitchen.  When I can give her a gift this inexpensive which she finds useful and gives her such pleasure, I feel very fortunate.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a low-low price
Reviews.Author: smale
Reviews.Content: This little TV packs quite a punch. The picture is awesome even without an HD cable box. I have had some problems with sound on other TVs, but this one is great!

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: B. Stoughton "Painless"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my kicthen. Excellent color, good visibility. If you put the TV up high recommend getting an articulating arm so you can tilt the screen.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: John J. Johnsen "way2goofy"
Reviews.Content: Purchased the 19" Vizio for a small 3 season room. I was surprised by the clear picture and sound quality of a smaller flatscreen. For under $200 we are very happy with the TV. The picture is so clear it makes me want to get rid of our Sony rear projection for a newer tv with a picture like the Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: digitaldad
Reviews.Content: Vizio was purchased for kitchen use. Setup is easy and takes up minimum space.Picture is great, but the sound is not too pleasant - very thin, it does have plenty of input/output options though. Purchased some small computer speakers to enhance the sound. Would give it 5 stars if not for the sound.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: * Rocky Top Boys *
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect size TV for the kitchen. I has great sound and picture and is just right for my kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: JodiWalksPink
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television for my den. It did not disappoint. The picture and sound are crisp and clear. I would recommend this Vizio 19 inch television to anyone looking for a great TV at a great price for a small space.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Kitchen
Reviews.Author: my2cents
Reviews.Content: Ordered this item after finally convicing my wife about replacing our older analog tv set in our kitchen, which was taking up valuable counter space.  I received this item along with a wall mount and quickly mounted it up on a corner of my kitchen.  I must say, this is a great little TV with a superb image quality and great viewing angles.  I currently have it connected to a set of rabbit-ear antennas for reception, which aren't the greatest, but they will do for now.  Wife is also happy to have reclaimed her lost counter space :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: David M. Little
Reviews.Content: Out of the box easy to set up.  Powered on and received great picture and decent sound out of this little TV.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Texas lass
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture and sound-- a large number of features such as parental control, sleep timer, computer input.  Extremely slim and light weight.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: I got this because I'm deployed and I couldn't be happier. Great price, product quality and picture! Next TV at home might just be a VIZIO.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased With This TV
Reviews.Author: Marie Okeefe
Reviews.Content: I bought this television for my kitchen. The picture is crisp and clear (really great) and the sound is also great. I only need to keep the volume less than halfway to hear it more than adequately, even though I am slightly hard of hearing. It's also very attractive and looks great in my kitchen. I also purchased the Premier Flip Mount to install underneath my cabinet. I have a pass through from my kitchen to my dining room with stools on the dining room side to eat at the counter. When I am working in the kitchen, I can watch my favorite shows. When I'm eating, the television can be rotated to be viewed from the other side. How convenient! It also flips up under the cabinet to store out of the way. I am very pleased with the purchase of both the television and the mount. For the price, you can't beat this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 19" TV
Reviews.Author: Barbara G. Watts
Reviews.Content: Vizio 19" Class 720p 60Hz LED LCD HDTV (M190VA) This TV was everything it promised and much more! Easy to assemble, it was up and running in no time. The picture quality was great, and the TV fits perfectly in a compact space.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: DigitalPainteress
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dorm room and it is perfect! I just wish the menu was a little bigger - I don't want to strain my eyes but other than that, I love it. It is also VERY loud.... my TV hardly goes above 10 and the sound is loud enough for me to hear.

Reviews.Title: t.v purchase
Reviews.Author: CDonohew
Reviews.Content: Received t.v. when expected and it was an awesome purchase! The quality was exceptional. That's it!  Will make another purchase through AMAZON and with this vendor~

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Madcity JJ
Reviews.Content: I orignally purchased a toshiba but returned it due to the horrible sound quality.  I was told I would get that with any small flat screen.  I then purchased the Visio and I love it.  The sound is not perfect but it is way better than the toshiba.  My only complaint on this TV is that the channel number display on the screen is very small and so are the menu options when trying to adjust the TV.

Reviews.Title: good little tv
Reviews.Author: Huggorr
Reviews.Content: The picture is great. The only complaint is the sound quality. Now I wish I had bought the 24" instead.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV!  What is wrong with Amazon's pricing?
Reviews.Author: Okiejon "Okiejon"
Reviews.Content: I agree with the majority of the reviewers. This seems like a great little TV for the kitchen, bedroom etc. I have been wary of the Vizio brand. I am more of a brand name consumer like Samsung & Sony. Vizio seems to be developing a pretty good reputation and at the Wal-Mart price, it seemed like a safe bet. What is wrong with Amazon? I use to depend on them for very competive pricing but during my Christmas shopping I found several glaring exceptions. This Vizio (EV-190VA is another example. Wal-Mart previously sold this TV for $178. Now is it $158! What is wrong with you Amazon? $244.99! That is more than free shipping can compensate for. I apologize if I am missing something here, but it sure seems like Amazon has this item way overpriced. The Visio MSRP is $199.99.

Reviews.Title: Just like the other reviews: outstanding
Reviews.Author: Harrison
Reviews.Content: This television is wonderful in all aspects. It was replacing a dated "HD Ready" Westinghouse and I could not be more surprised by the quality. It has a nice manual (in all English) with simple set up instructions. I was even able to connect it to our Verizon FiOS without a box. The sound is even better than my 50 inch Panasonic. (2011) I was hesitant with vizio, as we had previous problems with one in the bedroom, but this is exempt to the "vizio curse." Spectacular buy, great cost, and nice set up + menus make this Television a must.

Reviews.Title: Simple Little HDTV
Reviews.Author: abby r.
Reviews.Content: I got this HDTV for my dorm and it is perfect.  I mostly use it for my Xbox and DVDs.  It took no time to set up.  Simply put the stand on and plug it in and you are good to go.  There is no need for setting anything up once you turn the television on, but it is easy to adjust the brightness etc with the remote if you so choose.  The image is crisp and sharp with a matte screen so no glare.  No complaints about the sound, either.  It even has a headphone jack which is great for college or setting up separate speakers.  It is also small and light enough where I can keep this TV on my desk while using my computer or turn it if I want to lay in bed and watch a movie.  I can't vouch for how long it lasts, because I have only had it for a month or so, but I did buy it used and it is still working great.All in all, this is a great simple little TV.  Perfect for small apartments, dorms, and kitchens.  With a lot of versatility and options, it does not require a lot of set up and hullabaloo.  I definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Author: Joseph T Party
Reviews.Content: Very happy with it so far, about one month. The speakers are a little tin sounding though. Five stars with a better sound.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Kitchen Counter TV; Sits on Cable Box
Reviews.Author: P. Donohoe "Just A Guy"
Reviews.Content: Set-up steps described in manual were very easy to follow; picture/sound are very good. One minor comment: an "hdmi" connection cable, to connect from cable box to the TV, is recommended in the Vizio TV user manual as the "Best" connection for the TV's picture & sound, but no hdmi connector cable came with the TV. Had to quickly buy an hdmi cable separately (app. $27).  Only needed a 3 ft. hdmi cable to connect from back of the cable box to the Vizio TV, reducing the "cable jungle" behind the TV, a plus.  Would have been nice if an hdmi cable (or two, of different lengths) came with the TV, at lesser extra cost to Vizio and to the TV's buyer.  Very pleased with this Vizio TV.  Would have preferred silver color, rather than black; couldn't find it, but not a big deal for us.  A fine countertop TV.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier!
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: It's perfect for the dorm/small bedroom setting. I use it to watch movies, watch TV and game. I have no issues with any port, and so long as its not at too extreme of an angle, the picture is visible. I purchased it in the summer of 2011, and it still works. It was worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E190VA Razor LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much Vizio & Amazon. I have been searching for the ideal small screen TV, read many, many reviews and decided on this Vizio (E190VA). I purchased four (4), they support my security system and normal viewing at four different locations. They produce outstanding video and audio via my security cameras. Using the split screen x2 or x4 has very little negative effect on the images produced. I also use 2 of them for my photo editing projects. My wife enjoys watching our GreatGrandchildren playing in the backyard while viewing her cooking shows on TV in the kitchen. All four have the capability to switch back and forth between security monitoring and normal TV and/or videos. Three are mounted on the walls to keep from taking valuable table space. If my memory doesn't fail me, I think during 2011~2012 this model was rated #1 in the top five 19" HDTVs. I personnally recommend this HDTV to anyone that is interested in this size.Video from DVD, VCR, Digital Cameras, etc., is excellent. It is hard to tell the difference between 1080 and 720 because of size of the screen. Audio is also outstanding with it's internal speakers, however, with a 5.1 computer speaker system, it is even better.

Reviews.Title: Great for small spaces.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Mens
Reviews.Content: We have this TV in the kitchen, and it's great for that and other small spaces.  The picture is clear and the sound is sharp.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a small area
Reviews.Author: Virginia
Reviews.Content: This TV was chosen for it's size, picture, and price at first. But, I got a bonus!  I was very surprised to find that the sound was so good. Lower, and softer, and not tinny.  They have improved.  The picture is beautiful and the price is great.  We are happy with it.It sits on its own base, no pedelstal.  It may be wall mounted very easily.We have an older Vizio 19" in our kitchen, but it has always had a tinny treble sound, no matter how you adjust the menu. This one went in a bedroom where the softer sound was appreciated.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: John F. Raun
Reviews.Content: take some getting use to new viewing size 16:9 wish Comcast send H. D. to all with out box for all TV's only kind of tv I can buy.

Reviews.Title: An indepth review
Reviews.Author: pennywyze
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Vizio Razor from Amazon, and just an interesting side note is that I purchased a 19" LCDTV by Dynex just a few months prior that I was extremely disappointed with, but this is not the case with Vizio. Anyway, here's an indepth review.Picture clarity- 9.5/10Crisp, clear and customizable.I use this TV primarily for gaming so that I don't take up the 40" and I have to say that the image clarity is really good. I played PS2, Wii, Xbox 360, Original Xbox, Dreamcast and PS3; and every console looks really nice on this screen. But there is a slight catch being that the viewing angle of this TV is a little strange. If you're viewing too low, the screen will appear dark with a shimmer, if you view too high, it looks very bright. So you have to view it at the right angle. Personally, this isn't really a problem considering the biggest problem would be viewing it from a laying position.Besides gaming, I also tested my Roku Player, regular TV and DVD. All to which I'll say still looks really good. My only problems with Roku was the fact that despite the TV's options to stretch or pan an image, some videos will come out cropped. This is probably because their native resolution was somewhere around 480i but the Roku only bumps up the quality while not messing with the resolution. Sadly, you'll have to deal with those videos if you watch them because you cannot stretch the image, so in essence, you lose about 4-6 inches of the screen.Features- 10/10Before I get into any of the main features of this TV, I want to speak on the TV's tuner. The TV works just as good as any tuner on a big TV and I got all my DTV channels. The only problem you'll run into with the tuner would be where the TV or HDTV antennae is positioned. Now, onto the features.I really liked the fact that this TV has so many connections. There's HDMI x2, component, AV, S-video, digital optical output, headphones jack, Aux, RF and USB. The usb connection will scan a usb device for photos so that you're able to see them using the TV's slideshow. This was kinda cool; but not really necessary. Unfortunately, the USB connection will only scan photos and I haven't gotten it to play music or videos.The Vizio Razor has a cool slim looking remote, but in addition to the remote design, it also has touch technology to access the menu. This means no more loud "clicking sounds" to adjust volume. I was particularly fond of this being that I'm a fan of tablets.The actual menu has a lot of options such as picture settings to adjust color, picture noise, color temperature or custom, there's audio settings featuring SRS trusound, truvolume or customizable sound with an equalizer. The equalizer was pretty decent. It lets you adjust the bass, treble and such, but I haven't used it much.There's also the autoprogramming which would be your tuner settings. There's a cool feature for the tuner being that it can tune in stereo, SAP or mono separately. Also, after scanning for channels, there's an option for scanning "for new channels" which means that whatever channel you previously had you'll keep but any new channels you find will be added. Most larger TV's or more expensive TV's don't have this feature. This TV features closed captioning, energy saving, language support and such. It just really features a lot of options.Design- 9/10I like the design. The TV is thin. It has a very slight bulkiness in the back where the connections are; but it's still very thin. It's also light.The one thing I didn't like about the TV would be it's AC adapter (which can be disconnected). The adapter just looks like a block with the "Vizio" logo.Sound- 9/10I've read some reviews on here that says the "sound is bad" and that couldn't be further away from the truth. The sound is customizable and if you leave it as default which would be "flat" then perhaps that's where the reviewers where coming from. However, being that this TV features SRS trusound and tru volume as well as an equalizer, I don't see any problems.One issue I found using this TV would be that at times if SRS trusound is turned on, the sound will echo and it is annoying. I thought it was my gaming consoles at first, but it happened with TV stations. I simply turned off the SRS trusound and problem solved.I wish it had a little more options to customize the sound, because my craptacular Dynex 19" actually has a ton of sound options not found on this TV. Also, the sound is really loud. I found that turning the volume up to 4 or even 8 was sufficient. The volume goes up to 100. When using earphones, you have to tweak the sound because it can be really low requiring you to blast the volume. This doesn't happen when using headphones.Overall, this TV is a fantastic purchase. The picture clarity is great. The only downside would be the fact that the TV's 720p with 1080i max resolution. It's good for gaming. I play Battlefield, Call of Duty, Gears of War, God of war and such on it and it looks fine. PS2 games were a little questionable at times, but you have to play with the color. I bought mine for a little over 100 dollars and are happy with it.In comparison to Sony or Samsung, I'd say that the picture clarity is about on par but slightly less. Still, the images are crisp and clear with I believe 5ms response time. This TV's a must buy if you want quality at a price that's not going to break your pockets.Edit- Apparently this TV actually does 1080P.

Reviews.Author: element2011
Reviews.Content: Picture and sound are really good, especially for this price point.  In the manual, I noticed Vizio offers lifetime technical support via phone, which hopefully won't be necessary, but is definitely a plus.

Reviews.Title: Better than average
Reviews.Author: Sachimo
Reviews.Content: I noticed this compact thin LED TV and I was taken by it so I bought 3 Razor LED based for 3 separate bedrooms in my house. The unit is very thin and sleek but the picture is not very sharp. I would have thought the smaller the screen the sharper the image (specially from VIZIO) BUT overall for the price and looks, I give this product 3.5 stars.

Reviews.Title: 19" Vizio
Reviews.Author: Earl Chloupek
Reviews.Content: Reviewed many small LCD-LED TV's for my kitchen. Found that many lose screen brightness whensemi dark. Tried 2 top brands, returned them. After reading reviews about the Vizio I orderedit from Amazon. Love it. Great picture, sound etc..Just right for my kitchen..  Earl Chloupek

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Jim H. "Spike71"
Reviews.Content: This is my second one.  I have had the first Vizio E19OVA in my Fifth-Wheel camper for about a year now and it a great set for the money.  Thus the reason for the second one when I needed a secondary set for home.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: ktg
Reviews.Content: I just had my kitchen remodeled and was looking for the perfect gift for my husband.  This set was easy to install, the picture is very clear, the sound is perfect and the size is just the right size for a kitchen.T give it two thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: GOOD LOOKS & SOUND
Reviews.Author: ED LAMBERT
Reviews.Content: MY VIZIO WAS PURCHASED MAINLY FOR THE FEATURES & THE SPEAKERS FACING FORWARD . BELIVE ME IT HAS OUT DONE ITSELF . THE SOUND IS A GREAT , THE PICTURE IS OUTSTANDING . I LOVE IT FROM THE FIRST MINUTE I TURNED IT ON .

Reviews.Title: I love this tv!!
Reviews.Author: Lindalou54
Reviews.Content: This tv has a great crystal clear picture and works well to put in a bedroom.  Well worth the $$$.

Reviews.Title: One of the best little HDTV =Great little one
Reviews.Author: a cute bear "TNM"
Reviews.Content: Very good Sound and Video.USB: Flash Driver (Kington  worked /played photo good/better than Sandis(not played).HDTV is better than others.Easy to controls and connection.Everything is good on this little HDTV=Great HDTV.Good price.Shipping fast.

Reviews.Title: Great little tv
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: I have a very small studio in the city and purchased this as my main tv. It is great and no complaints. Might get one a little bigger in the future but not much. Just have a hard time reading the tivo menu from far away sometimes, but that is probably more my problem than the tv's.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size and features
Reviews.Author: Darin Preston "Darbarian"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Vizio Razor for my mother. She has limited space and needed something that would be stable when sitting on a small pedestal. Not only did the Razor fit perfectly, the built in speaker was more than enough to fill the area with full sound!You will not find a better television for the price.Five stars!Darin

Reviews.Title: vizio 19in lcd
Reviews.Author: 64 pilot
Reviews.Content: Using this tv on deployment. Works great with a clear picture and OK sound. For a used tv could hardly tell it was ever used.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!!
Reviews.Author: VINNY-MAC
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best quality, best looking and the best picture.I would definitely buy a VIZIO product again and again. Money well spent. I wall mounted this unit in the kids room very, very pleased. (No I don't work for VIZIO or AMAZON, just very happy with the purchase.)

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: This is a great little T.V. and for under $200.00! Item came as described and it was a great gift from my husband!

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Keith Robinson
Reviews.Content: I had to break down and buy a new tv because I just bought a Blu-Ray player. My old HDTV didn't have an HDMI hook up though, this one does, it allows me to hook up by Blu-Ray by HDMI, hook up a coaxial cable hook up and my 360 via video cords.That being said, the picture looks a bit dark, that's should be easy enough to change, after setting up the TV, I actually had to manually search for cable channels, it appears the default option was searching for them over antenna.But the design of this tv sits down on the desk. Like directly on the desk. I like my other one, it was propped up more so the picture was higher, my Blu-Ray player sits in front of this and sits right down in front of the tv's sensor.EDIT: I will also add now (because I already left feedback on them and new developments have happened), don't buy from Quick Ship Electronics. I purchased my tv from them (used), I'm fine with used and refurbished. What I was not thrilled with was having to return it for a new one because the coaxial input was broke. Then I got the new one. Well, I finally popped in my first Blu-Ray movie (the reason I bought the tv), and it turns out the HDMI 1 slot is broke. Thankfully #2 works, but I expect everything to work unless stated otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Vizio does the job
Reviews.Author: D. Brandt "TheOhioState"
Reviews.Content: We recently purchased the Vizio E190A 19-inch HD TV for the bedroom, after the previous television had quit working.  The Vizio has a great picture at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Deployment Morale Booster
Reviews.Author: isaiah1990
Reviews.Content: Received my VIZIO in the mail just a couple of days ago, and can honestly say that it takes a lot of stress off! Im currently deployed in Afghanistan and my VIZIO gives me the opportunity to stay up to date with the latest games that were released. I also ordered BF3 and MW3 from Amazon and it will definitely make these next 7 months zoom by!As far as quality, you cant get anything better from an 19 inch!

Reviews.Title: Good, but not the greatest
Reviews.Author: TDR
Reviews.Content: I purchased this awhile ago, and returned it after a week. There was just something odd about the screen size that threw me off. Also despite playing with it forever, I could never really get the colors how I thought they should be. I honestly didn't think the picture was that great to be honest. At least notcompared to how it's desribed in reviews.The reason I ultimatly decided to return it was after a week long marathon of a TV I noticed one night a plastic-y burning smell from it. I didn't want to take chances so I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Line across top of display
Reviews.Author: tjk
Reviews.Content: When using either set of RCA connections (composite or component) I got a garbled line all the way across the top edge of the display, about a quarter of an inch high, and all the way across the display. I called Vizio tech support, thinking there might be some way to adjust the picture vertically, or maybe there was a firmware update to correct the issue. No for both questions. Tech support told me to return the TV. I returned the TV to the W store where I got it, and purchased another one. This had the exact same issue, so I returned it also.The TV did work fine using the antenna input.I've since tried the same RCA input connections (they're actually security cameras connected via RCA) on other TVs with no issues. Thus, I am left to conclude there is some kind of issue with the RCA inputs on this TV. I wonder if others have tried the RCA inputs and had the same experience? Something to consider if you're planning on using RCA inputs with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Smaller than I expected
Reviews.Author: dee
Reviews.Content: As always, Amazon.com service was excellent however the TV is smaller than I expected.  Picture and sound are ok but I ended up using this TV as my PC monitor and now using what was my monitor as the TV in our guest room.
